    ShoppingCart - Class in com.fulda.webshop.model
    ShoppingCart represents a user's shopping cart containing selected products.

    ShoppingCartController - Class in com.fulda.webshop.controller

    ShoppingCartService - Class in com.fulda.webshop.service
    ShoppingCartService manages the shopping cart operations, including adding products, retrieving the current cart, and calculating total prices.
